name: Tellstones: King’s Gambit
summary: Tellstones: King’s Gambit is the unforgettable game of bluffing, strategy, and recollection from the world of Runeterra. To win, you’ll need to focus on playing the player, not the game.
info:
• 别名: 說石：王之高招
  • 游戏类型: 桌游
  • 游玩人数: 2~4
  • 官方网站: www.tellstones.com
